ISSUE.TITLE: [feature]: Add "Mark all as read" under notification
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [x] I have searched the existing issues ### Summary Add button that marks all notifications as read. ### Why should this be worked on? Clicking "Mark as read" over and over on every single notification gets old quickly.
